ValidationRule.description: requirement 572: Initial Offer Due Date should be : planned dates. Planned dates must be: > G3 planned date AND < G5 planned date AND cannot be set as past date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( Initial_Offer_Planned_Date__c < G3_Planned_Date__c, Initial_Offer_Planned_Date__c > G5_Planned_Date__c, AND( ISCHANGED(Initial_Offer_Planned_Date__c ), Initial_Offer_Planned_Date__c < today() ), AND( ISNEW(), Initial_Offer_Planned_Date__c < today() ) ) && ($Profile.Name<>$Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Initial Offer Planned Date must be in between G3 planned date and G5 planned date and must not be in past.
